MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L36 postcode area of Liverpool affecting properties in Paxton Road and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  11:27pm. Our emergency response team is currently onsite carrying out investigations and will commence repairs to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:30am. Once we receive information from them we will make every effort to let you know when the power will be restored. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:39pm on 16th December 2020
